DataSourcePortable.Name: Inventários do imobilizado
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
BENS.STATUS,
COUNT(BENS.HANDLE) QTDE

FROM (SELECT ITEM.HANDLE,
 (CASE 
 WHEN ULTIMOINV.HANDLE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Bens inventariados'
 WHEN ITEM.DATAAQUISICAO >= @ANO[1] THEN 'Aquisição no ano'
 ELSE 'Não inventariados'
 END) STATUS
 FROM AT_ITENS ITEM
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT ITEINV.ITEM, MAX(ITEINV.HANDLE) HANDLE
 FROM AT_ITEMINVENTARIOS ITEINV
 WHERE ITEINV.DATA BETWEEN @ANO[1] AND @ANO[2]
 GROUP BY ITEINV.ITEM ) ULTIMOINV ON ULTIMOINV.ITEM = ITEM.HANDLE
 ) BENS

GROUP BY BENS.STATUS" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="STATUS" From="A" Path="STATUS" /> <Field Alias="QTDE" From="A" Path="QTDE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
